materials.name: N-[N-(3,5-difluorophenacetyl)-l-alanyl]-S-phenylglycine t-butyl ester (DAPT) (Santa Cruz, cat no. SC201315)
Dulbeccoâ€™s phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) (no calcium, no magnesium) (Thermo Fisher Scientific, cat. no. 14190-144)
Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA; Supelco) (EMD Millipore, cat. No. 1.08452.1000)

params.note: Protocol includes observations of hPSC morphology, colony morphology pre-seeding, abnormal morphologies, pre-attachment, spontaneous differentiation, epithelialization, monolayer and 3D culture stages across days.
Reagents used: DRAQ7, DAPT, DMEM/F12 with HEPES, Donkey serum, PBS (no Ca/Mg), EDTA.
